Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class FaithPath

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.FaithPath
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FaithPath
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents the faith path. cards is an array list of cards containing the 3 Pope's favor tiles. playerPositions contains each player's position playerPV contains all of the victory points earned in the faith path cardState contains the state of each card for each player. report represents how many vatican reports occurred
See Also:
Serialized Form
